pretext: Hi ! I'm Gabriel Juchault, an undergraduate student in computer science. I'm currently at the University of Technology of Troyes for a MSc.
posttext: I'm pretty interested by development (web & software). I'm a huge fan of web programming (ES2015/2016, frameworks, etc.) but I am also a Node-lover.
By the past I used to use C#/C++ and other compiled languages. I still do (for some C++ Node plugins, etc.) and I enjoy Qt when I go for C++.
Beside my studies, I'm a lot in associative projects (game jams, hackatons, LAN Parties, NFC student cards, etc.).
You may check my GitHub or my LinkedIn.

And in my personal life, I'm a musician (about 10 years of cello, and 2 years of electric guitar). I do Krav Maga (self-defense/combat), Soccer Table, and scuba diving. I also like politics and economy.
